alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Franklin; Richland (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 3:55PM CDT until June 14 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Columbia, moving east at 65 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR Winnsboro, Sicily Island and surrounding areas. HAZARD...Softball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Liddieville around 405 PM CDT. Winnsboro and Jigger around 410 PM CDT. Wisner and Gilbert around 415 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...4.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to shelter inside a strong building, and stay away from windows.
